title: (x) two sans serifs / business cards of Daniel Ocean and IQ Videography - Copperplate Gothic, Bank Gothic {Big Bill, Nina}
content:
Hi, can anyone help identify the two sans serif fonts here...

sorry for the low resolution of the screenshot image.

comments.content:
The first one looks like a serif, but really tiny.

Second one is Bank Gothic.
